oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Gumbo
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Labor play about sharecroppers in delta country. Features "We Shall Not Be Moved." The play was designed to teach sharecroppers the benefits of unionizing and poor white southerners the similarities of their circumstances to poor Black southerners. The play contains some problematic Black stereotypes as well as offensive racist language.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Labor unions--Organizing--United States; Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); Sharecroppers
